pkgmetadata.longdescription: JiTCxDE Common is a collection common code for`JiTCODE <http://github.com/neurophysik/jitcode>`_,`JiTCDDE <http://github.com/neurophysik/jitcdde>`_, and`JiTCSDE <http://github.com/neurophysik/jitcsde>`_.Youâ€™ll need it if you install any of them manually.Otherwise it should be automatically installed as a dependency.
